roleset.name: discovery
roleset.note: FIND-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls discover-84, get-13.5.1. (from find.01-v)
FINDING-N NOTES: Corresponds with find.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from finding.01-n)
FIND-N NOTES: Corresponds with find.01. Framed by anwen april 2011, lemma and examples updated by Claire. (from find.01-n)

roles.note: In "the findings of the study are inconclusive" it is not eventive (it is its own arg1). (from finding.01-n)

example.name: find-v: basic transitive
example.text: I-1'd like *trace*-1 to find a flight that goes from Boston to Orlando.
example.arg: a flight that goes from Boston to Orlando

example.name: find-v: found a sentence!
example.text: The study also found that the colony's consumers feel more pressured than those in any of the other surveyed markets.
example.arg: that the colony's consumers feel more pressured than those in any of the other surveyed markets

example.name: finding-n: Arg0, Arg1
example.text: Carter and Herbert's finding of the tomb of Tutankhamun was significant.

example.name: finding-n: Within LVC
example.text: State engineers have made a preliminary finding that it was failure of the concrete columns , wrenched and separated from the double-decker roadbed , that was responsible for the collapse .
example.arg: that it was failure of the concrete columns , wrenched and separated from the double-decker roadbed , that was responsible for the collapse .

example.name: find-n
example.text: This place was a real find!

roleset.name: adjudge
roleset.note: FIND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'find' based on file created by Chris, survey of initial sentences of big corpus, and minimal comparison with 'receive', revised by Olga and Arrick (from find.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: find-v: with a small clause
example.text: State courts found the rates illegal.

roleset.name: discovery
roleset.note: FIND_OUT-V NOTES: Frame edited by Arrick. (from find.03-v)

example.name: find_out-v: discover
example.text: Most people have a strong deisre * to find out about it, so as a result they have * to pick up what they can *?* *T*-2.

roleset.name: establish, base
roleset.note: FOUND-V NOTES: Based on sentences in financial subcorpus; nominal 'foundation' based on BOLT-6. Comparison with institute and set. Member of VNcls establish-55.5-1, base-97.1. (from found.01-v)
FOUNDING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, found.01. Corresponds to VNcls establish-55.5-1, base-97.1. (from founding.01-n)
FOUNDATION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from foundation.01-n)

roles.note: arg2 of the verb has been split up here into 2 args, since it covered two different types of arguments. (from founding.01-n)

example.name: found-v: transitive
example.text: Mr. Mingo was chief executive officer of the Mingo Group, which-1 he founded *trace*-1 in 1977 and which created ads for the black market.

example.name: found-v: with attribute
example.text: John founded the city of Atlantis as a stronghold in times of trouble.
example.arg: as a stronghold in times of trouble

example.name: foundation-n
example.text: A 3D photon superposition/convolution algorithm and its foundation on results of Monte Carlo calculations*.
example.arg: on results of Monte Carlo calculations

example.name: non-eventive: foundation; CALL .YY!!!
example.text: A home was swept off its foundation and collecting into the overflowing Big Thompson River from recent flooding in the Big Thompson Canyon in Larimer County, Colorado on Saturday morning, September 14, 2013.

example.name: founding-n: arg1
example.text: Dear Fellow American , This 4th of July , while you and your family celebrate the 230th Anniversary of the founding of our great nation , there 's one party you wo n't be invited to ...

example.name: founding-n: args 0, 1, 2
example.text: Their founding of the Lowcountry Down Syndrome Society in 2006 as a non-profit family support group has served to launch a mission of support, outreach, education and advocacy for people with Down Syndrome.
example.arg: of the Lowcountry Down Syndrome Society
as a non-profit family support group

example.name: founding-n: args 1 and 2
example.text: It's ironic that the day Maryland celebrates its founding on the principles of religious expression and toleration, it's government curses the name and purpose of it's very existence.
example.arg: on the principles of religious expression and toleration
